title: Revolution Hospital
text:
Revolution Hospital is the largest hospital in <a href="Yemen">Yemen</a>, located in the capital of <a href="Sana%27a">Sana'a</a>, immediately southwest of <a href="Ghumdan%20Palace">Ghumdan Palace</a>. It is one of the largest building complexes in the city.
This hospital may also be known as Al Thawra Revolution Hospital.
